Detailed Description

Functions and classes responsible for the processing a series of images .

const std::string &  in 
)

Converts the string "in" into the Dcenter _val. To be used in the CLI parsing via "poptmx" library.

Parameters:

instring to be parsed.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.

std::vector<int> EXPERIMENT_API slice_str2vec ( const std::string &  sliceS,
int  hight 
)

Constructs the array of slices.

Constructs the array of slices to be processed from the slice string (read SliceOptionDesc for more details).

Parameters:
sliceSInput SliceOptionDesc "slice string".
hightHeight of the input projection(s).
Returns:
The vector consisting of the numbers of slices to be processed. The vector is sorted and duplicates are removed.
